name: 洪子晏
objective:
本課程介紹作業研究中非線性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含整數規劃、動態規劃、賽局原理、馬可夫鏈、等候原理、存貨模式、專案管理、模擬等。
In this course, the basic concepts and applications of Nonlinear Programming Models in Operations Research. It includes Integer Programming、Dynamic Programming、Game Theory、Markovian Chains、Queueing Theory、Inventory Theory、Project Management and Simulation Modeling﹒
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2-Week 4: Network Optimization Models
Week 5-6: Project Management
Week 7-8: Integer Programming
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10:No class
Week 11-Week 12: Dynamic Programming
Week 13-Week 14: Decision Analysis
Week 15-Week 17: Markov Chain
Week 18: Final Exam
materials:
Introduction to operations research (McGraw Hill)
Frederick S. Hillier Gerald J. Lieberman

作業究。臺北市：華泰文化，2009 [民 98], 2009.
